title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Discussion-Based Strategies for Enhancing Online Learning Experiences and Self-Regulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental proficiency in online learning platforms and self-directed learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three self-regulated learning strategies in online learning environments via Moodle discussion assignments.
Learners can practice self-reflective learning attitudes with over 80% participation by utilizing peer feedback in discussion activities.
Learners can write a report analyzing the social context of discussion topics by applying a deep learning approach.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
